title: The Black Douglas ... Second impression.
author: Crockett, Samuel Rutherford.
snippet: At last they entered the demesne of Holyrood, and saw the deer crouching and basking about the copses or scampering over the broomy knowes of the Nether Hill. As they came near to the Canongate Port, they saw a gallant band gaily dressed coming forth to meet them, aud the Earl's eye brightened as it caught in the midst the glint of ladies' attiring.

title: Cleg Kelly, Arab of the City
author: Crockett, Samuel Rutherford.
snippet: He glanced up at the heather and whin which covered the Nether Hill. His heart bounded within him at the thought.
